Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: News media featured a range of stories today with topics spanning from emergency rescues to economic updates. Highlights include a major sea rescue of stranded fisherman off WA's coast and the Reserve Bank's recent "close call" interest rate decision that had the Australian share market in decline. Additionally concerns were raised over the current level of JobSeeker payments being insufficient to support Australian families during the COVID-19 pandemic. Various other economic issues were also touched on showcasing the current financial climate and its ongoing impact on people's daily lives.
